title: Monday, June 19, 2017
description: Why Senate leaders are crafting the most important legislation of the Trump presidency in secret. Guest: Carl Hulse, who covers Congress. For more information on today’s episode, visit http://nyti.ms/2rIs7dC.
author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
